name: Swishy Bird
description:
Welcome to SwishyBird.

A Flappy Bird clone, with a little extra. The bird can miraculously come back to life by spending a few coins you gather from playing. It's a simple game, that never is the same. Everything is generated randomly, but within bounds so it will never be impossible to beat.

Share your scores with your friends and brag about being better at tapping than them.
